channel.title: World
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from World, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Switzerland to hold five days of mourning after 40 killed in resort fire
item.description: Blaze that swept through crowded New Year’s Eve bar in Crans-Montana also injured 115 people Le Constellation bar fire in Switzerland: what we know so...

item.title: Zohran Mamdani vows to govern New York ‘expansively and audaciously’ after being sworn in by Bernie Sanders – live

item.title: Zohran Mamdani promises ‘new era’ for New York City in first speech as mayor
item.description: Mayor says ‘I will govern as a democratic socialist’ at inauguration ceremony featuring AOC and Bernie Sanders Zohran Mamdani on Thursday vowed to “re...

item.title: Irish man found dead at famous Whitehaven beach among four deaths on Australia’s east coast
item.description: A woman has also died after being swept into the ocean in Sydney on New Year’s Day, while the body of a man was found near Palm beach Get our breaking...

item.title: Chelsea part company with manager Maresca after 18 months
item.description: Less than six months after guiding Chelsea to Club World Cup success, Enzo Maresca has left. But how did things unravel?

item.title: Rosenior leading contender for Chelsea job
item.description: Strasbourg boss Liam Rosenior is the leading contender to be the next Chelsea manager, but others remain under consideration.

item.title: Social media fuelled Mamdani's rise. Can he keep the momentum as New York mayor?
item.description: To succeed in office he will need to keep his supporters engaged with day-to-day governing, experts say.

item.title: Rosenior leading contender for Chelsea job
item.description: Strasbourg boss Liam Rosenior is the leading contender to be the next Chelsea manager, but others remain under consideration.

item.title: Littler thrills crowd with dominant last-eight win
item.description: Luke Littler receives a positive response from the Alexandra Palace crowd during his PDC World Championship quarter-final win over Krzysztof Ratajski.
